Text: The8Ts, I used to have The Reluctant Stereotypes lp but since I was never a big fan of Ska, I let it go somehow. However I remember I saw it posted in the blog of Marco On The Bass. Just google it and see if the link is still there.

Hello. First of all I want to thank for all the awesome music you have posted up on this website. Thanks to you my 80\'s music library has expanded to a point where I bought a terabyte just for your uploads. I need a favor, could you give me some names of really dark gothic bands? Thanks.
thank you so much. do you happen to have any of these gothic bands albums? or a link? thanks again, you are the greatest.
